This is a deed of title to the joint immovable property jointly registered by the above parties.
Nature of the deed:- We both are members of a Hindu undivided family. Among us
No. 1 asks for the 2nd wife. Our family inherited the property recorded under Record H.NO: 2-63 in Annapureddypalli Mandal, Ootupalli Grama Panchayat, and with the consent of all of us, it has been registered in the Grama Panchayat records in the name of the 1st of us for convenience and the house tax etc. are being paid in his name. Our joint family hard-earned family money is Rs. 2,00,000/- (Two Lakh Rupees). We are enjoying this immovable property which has been declared as joint family property jointly till today. Today, in the presence of all of us, this immovable property which has been in the joint possession of all of us has been divided into two shares i.e. Schedules A and B mentioned in this deed and the share of the said shares i.e. Schedule A-Schedule is given to our No. 1 Smt. Gunja Lakshmi alias Mahalakshmi's share and the share shown in Schedule B-cash are allotted to Gunja Ravindra garu's share and the movable and immovable properties that have come to their share should be taken over separately by each person on this day itself. From today onwards, the property that has come to their share should be taken over separately by each person on this day, with all the rights, including the land, rocks, water, treasures and deposits, with full and free enjoyment. We will not make any claim against each other regarding the shares being up or down, whether there are any advantages or disadvantages, or about the transfer of shares or about the properties that have been developed in the past, and if we do so, it will not be valid. This is a deed of inheritance of the joint family immovable property jointly signed by both of us. There is no other heir to our joint family property except us and there is no other immovable property that we have to share except these.
1) G. Lavindra

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: VOOTUPALLI/VOOTUPALLI W-B: 0-0   HOUSE: 2/63     EXTENT: 169.88SQ.Yds  BUILT: 605.88SQ. FT  H NO 2-63 Boundaries:  [N]: HOUSE OF GUNJA VENKANNA  [S] HOUSE OF PENUGONDA JAMALAIAH  [E]: GRAMA PANCHAYATHI CC ROAD [W]: HOUSE OF VEMULA NAGESH

sections.content: The property acquired by Gunja Laxmi @ Mahalaxmi by virtue of Partition Deed No. 603 of 2026, dated 27/ Jan/2026, being Schedule-A, measuring an extent of 169.88 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 2-63, Assessment Number 202, situated in Vootupalli Grama Panchayath, Annapureddy Mandal, within the District of Bhadradri Kothagudem, registered at Sub-Registrar office Kothagudem(2203), bounded as follows: North by: House of Gunja Venkanna South by: House of Penugonda Jamalaiah East by: Grama Panchayathi C.C. Road West by: House of Vemula Nagesh Note: It is to be noted that our legal verification is limited towards the property offered as security for the purpose of loan, i.e., Schedule-A, property of the Partition Deed. Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per recitals of the deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.
